scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && mkdir -p test/output && test/compare-images && uglifyjs -b beautify=false,preamble="'$(preamble)'" build/d3-geo-projection.js -c -m -o build/d3-geo-projection.min.js
scripts.postpublish: git push && git push --tags && cd ../d3.github.com && git pull && cp ../d3-geo-projection/build/d3-geo-projection.js d3-geo-projection.v2.js && cp ../d3-geo-projection/build/d3-geo-projection.min.js d3-geo-projection.v2.min.js && git add d3-geo-projection.v2.js d3-geo-projection.v2.min.js && git commit -m "d3-geo-projection ${npm_package_version}" && git push && cd - && zip -j build/d3-geo-projection.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-geo-projection.js build/d3-geo-projection.min.js
